attributes.additional_details: It isn't fair that the NHS have worked so hard for us over the last few months and now have to suffer. Some hospitals will charge NHS workers £77 A DAY to park there! This isn't right. Get the Conservatives out and put a party in charge who actually cares about people. Allow an online vote so that we can do it from home and stop the spread of COVID.
attributes.background: The Conservatives have made the UK into a shambles. They have no idea what they're doing with Brexit, they allowed COVID-19 into the country, they have caused 44,000 deaths, they have stood there clapping the NHS, while at the same time, cutting their salaries and making them pay for parking.

rejection.details:
The Government and House of Commons are not responsible for individual political parties.

We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
